Slide 1: Introduction
Title: Cafe 24 YouTube Shopping Proposal
Image Concept: Relevant image that represents the e-commerce technology and support for SMEs/startups
Representative Phrase: "Empowering the Growth of SMEs and Startups with Cafe24"
Details: This slide serves as an introduction to the proposal and highlights the main objectives of Cafe24 and its mission to support the growth of SMEs and startups. Start with a strong impact to capture the attention of the stakeholders.

Slide 2: Background
Title: Our Mission and Background
Image Concept: Relevant image that represents the mission and background of Cafe24
Representative Phrase: "Cafe24's Drive to Make a Difference in the E-Commerce Landscape"
Details: Provide a brief overview of the mission and background of Cafe24, including its role as a representative e-commerce technology company and its commitment to support the growth of SMEs and startups. Emphasize the unique value proposition of Cafe24 and its commitment to its mission.

Slide 3: Problem Statement
Title: Challenges Facing SMEs and Startups in E-Commerce
Image Concept: Relevant image that represents the challenges facing SMEs and startups in e-commerce
Representative Phrase: "Overcoming the Challenges to Fuel Growth"
Details: Discuss the challenges faced by SMEs and startups in e-commerce, such as difficulties in marketing, customer acquisition, and competition. Highlight the need for a solution that can support their growth. Emphasize the significance of the challenges and the need for a solution.

Slide 4: Proposed Solution
Title: Cafe24's Proposal: YouTube Shopping
Image Concept: Relevant image that represents the proposed YouTube shopping solution
Representative Phrase: "Leveraging YouTube to Drive Success"
Details: Introduce Cafe24's proposed solution of YouTube shopping to support the growth of SMEs and startups. Explain how Cafe24 helps SMEs and startups grow by providing opportunities to sell their products to a global audience and improve their marketing and customer acquisition efforts through YouTube. Emphasize the innovative and comprehensive nature of Cafe24's proposed solution.

Slide 5: Advantages of the Proposed Solution
Title: Key Benefits of Cafe24's YouTube Shopping
Image Concept: Relevant image that represents the key benefits of the proposed YouTube shopping solution
Representative Phrase: "Unlocking the Full Potential of E-Commerce with Cafe24"
Details: Highlight the key benefits of Cafe24's YouTube shopping solution, including increased efficiency, enhanced customer experiences, and improved sales. Also, mention that YouTube shopping has an advantage over other sales channels, such as a large global audience, the ability to showcase products through live broadcasts and videos, and the ability to create a store within a YouTube channel. Emphasize the tangible and intangible benefits of Cafe24's proposed solution.

Slide 6: Collaboration Point
Title: Partnering for Success: Cafe24 and [Stakeholder's Name]
Image Concept: Relevant image that represents partnership and collaboration
Representative Phrase: "Working Together to Fuel Growth"
Details: Discuss the potential collaboration between Cafe24 and the target stakeholder, including the mutual benefits and shared goals of such a partnership. Show how Cafe24 and the target stakeholder can work together to achieve the common goal of supporting the growth of SMEs and startups in e-commerce.
